title: Protestancy to be embrac'd, or, A new and infallible method to reduce Romanists from popery to Protestancy a treatise of great use to all His Majesties subjects, and necessary to prevent error and popery / by David Abercromby, D., lately converted, after he had profess'd near nineteen years Jesuitism and popery.
author: Abercromby, David, d. 1701 or 2.
publisher: Printed for the author by Thomas Hodgkin,
notes: Reproduction of original in British Library.
